about.title: About Me
about.description: My passion for the software world sparked my journey to becoming a full-stack developer. I have been developing projects with Python for the last 5 years, JavaScript for the last 2 years, and React for the last year. My analytical thinking ability, stemming from my physics education, allows me to approach every problem with a logical perspective. Driven by the philosophy that 'time is money,' I focus on automating manual processes. In this way, I not only write code but also produce user- and business-oriented solutions. I aim to create value in every project with strong teamwork, leadership instincts, and a commitment to continuous learning.

items.title: Hakkınızla Uçun
items.description: A flight search platform automating short-term round-trip flights between Turkey and Europe.
items.problem: Finding affordable, short-term international flights was a time-consuming and laborious process manually. Speed was critical, especially for promotional tickets.
items.solution: I developed an automation system using Next.js and Python that fetches round-trip flight data and filters it based on desired criteria (2-7 days, cheapest price). This system completely eliminated the manual search process.
items.result: Thanks to this system, I was able to find tickets to destinations like Switzerland, the Netherlands, and Austria at very affordable prices. This personal success served as concrete proof that automation saves time and money, eventually turning into a startup.
items.label: Automation

items.title: Monitorist
items.description: A real-time monitoring platform tracking the inventory of over 20 e-commerce sites.
items.problem: Manually tracking the stock status of limited edition (hype) products on e-commerce sites caused significant inefficiency. Since stocks were restocked without notice, missing opportunities was the nature of the business.
items.solution: I built a web scraping automation with Python that runs 24/7. This system continuously monitored hype products, recorded stock changes in an SQLite database, and delivered instant notifications to subscribers via Discord webhooks.
items.result: This automation provided an instant flow of information to me and resellers, offering the opportunity to act the moment stocks were added. This project demonstrated my ability to commercialize an idea, build a community, and generate tangible income through monthly membership sales.
items.label: Automation

items.title: SoliClub Security Analysis
items.description: Detection and analysis of a critical security vulnerability in Marmara University's cafeteria payment system.
items.problem: I identified that the SoliClub payment system had a security vulnerability due to a lack of validation for the payment amount sent from the client-side.
items.solution: I discovered the vulnerability by analyzing API traffic using reverse engineering and request interception techniques. I demonstrated this flaw with a demo application developed using modern web technologies (Next.js, React, Tailwind).
items.result: The vulnerability was reported to the university IT team under the principle of responsible disclosure and was subsequently patched. This project proved my competence in ethical hacking, API analysis, and system security alongside my web development skills.
items.label: Security

items.title: MarunGPT
items.description: An AI-powered student support chatbot trained with Marmara University data.
items.problem: There was a lack of a platform to provide fast and user-friendly answers to frequently asked student questions (courses, schedule, campus services). This situation created a burden on administrative units.
items.solution: We developed a chatbot integrated with OpenAI API and Elasticsearch, trained on the school's official documents. We created an intuitive interface with React and Tailwind CSS, managed data in MongoDB, and containerized it with Docker.
items.result: This project enabled students to access the information they sought instantly and automated administrative processes. Although it did not have a revenue model, it was a significant case study to showcase my skills in AI integration and user-centric product development.
items.label: Artificial Intelligence

items.title: TeknoPazar
items.description: A modern and user-friendly e-commerce management system.
items.problem: Existing management systems in the e-commerce sector reduced business efficiency by offering complex product addition processes and inadequate features.
items.solution: Using Next.js 15, PostgreSQL, and AWS S3, I developed a comprehensive e-commerce management system featuring a 7-step product addition wizard, drag-and-drop image management, and secure authentication.
items.result: This system reduced product addition time while lowering the error rate thanks to validations made with Zod. It helped businesses strengthen their digital assets by offering a more efficient management panel.
items.label: Full Stack

items.title: Hakkı Info (Portfolio)
items.description: A personal portfolio website designed with modern aesthetics and performance, developed specifically for you.
items.problem: There was a need to create a modern, unique, and personalized portfolio site to showcase professional identity, projects, and skills in the most effective way.
items.solution: I developed this site using the latest technologies such as Next.js 15, Tailwind CSS, and Framer Motion. I added features like a modular structure, centralized data management, and dark/light theme support.
items.result: The resulting product became a powerful portfolio site in terms of both aesthetics and functionality. This project proves my modern full-stack development capabilities and my ability to manage all processes of a product from design to deployment.
items.label: Full Stack
